name: Psion Series 3 eBook File
summary: Learn about .TCR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TCR files can still be viewed with some mobile device readers, such as ReadManiac, MicroReader, ReadM, and FBReader. They can also be viewed on a desktop computer with the cross-platform Calibre application and with Sumatra PDF in Windows.

description: eBook created in the TCR format, which was originally used by the older Psion Series 3 palmtop devices developed in the 1990s; stores the eBook text and formatting in a proprietary format used internally by the Psion device.
